name: Scream Supreme
description:
By Joaquin F. and Dalia T.

Our game is where you play as someone in a food court trying to get the food you want before the other people in the food court steal it from you.

The goal of the game is to get the food from the different stations around the food court and scare away the other people in the food court by screaming.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move, space to scream, enter to start and restart the game.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
